name: Torchknight
description:
Defeat the evil sorcerer without freezing to death. You can only be without warmth for 20 seconds! Explore a castle of 20 rooms to find the boss, slay it, and save the land.
Defeat skeletons with your sword and shield in hand or light fires by switching to your torch to keep warm.

Made for the Gamemaker 20th Anniversary Game-jam! 

Made in collaboration by Jesse Carradine and Starbox Games
